of hurting and harming me?
Isn't it enough?
Why have you come to awaken
painful wounds I forgot?
Or don't you like my ending
that you wrote with your own hands?
You're coming to add an extra line to it..
Isn't it enough?
There's nothing left in my life to give you
May God forgive you
And help me withstand my wounds
You bear the guilt
The guilt of hurting me is yours
But still despite myself
I prayed God would guide you to the right way
Isn't it enough?
There are thousands of bitter memories with traces in me
If you long for me
then I bet you long for hurting me
Only God knows your intentions
Isn't it enough?
Has our time together suddenly become precious to you?
Do you suddenly miss it?
Or do you miss the tears of my eyes?
If my absence hurts you
tell yourself that it's for my own sake

دة انت لو بتحن ليا

ربنا لوحده اللي عالم بالنوايا
مش كفاية
عز يعني عليك سنين بينك و بيني
ولا واحشينك يوميني
ولا وحشك دمع عيني
طب دة لو تعبك فراقي
قول فدايا
Can't you see something different
That I  look prettier after I have broken up with you
That I don't fit you
Oh, and that life is much better without you
No. I can see that I'm better now. I've got sick of our quarrels and agony
As if you were some evil and now has gone
I come and go whenever I like. There is no one sulks
In my life
Now, I tell people that I'm lucky (to let you go)
Coming back!
Can't you see that I'm laughing now. Do you know why?
It's because of the one who left me and know feels off my value
Why have you come back after you left everything behind?
You are right. I don't deserve to be with  you
Who have told you that I want to came back whereas your absence was my relief
If you really want to, it's not for my goodness
I have forgotten you and moved on
Please, accept my honesty
If you have thought  something else, you are deluded
Can't you see?
Can't you see something different?
That your voice is low; which is so not you
and you are so calm whatever I say
Suddenly you have found time for me
No. But I can see that I'm winning،, and that I love myself as I used to
And that I see my life coloured, and I'm calm and not worried
There's is no quarrels on my day. Who would miss this distress.
My heart was relieved the day you left, and I'm carefree
مش ملاحظ حاجة غريبة
إن شكلى احلو مثلا لما سيبتك
وإنى مش لايقة إنى أكون فعلا حبيبتك
آه صحيح والحياة احلوت فى غيبتك
لا ملاحظ إن أنا مرتاح زهقت خناق ملل وجراح
كإنك شر سابنى وراح وقربك منى هم انزاح
بنزل وأجى وقت ما أعوز مفيش فى حياتى لوية بوز
بقيت دلوقتى أقول للناس أنا محظوظ
نرجع إيه
مش ملاحظ إنى بضحك أنت عارف ضحكى ليه
ع اللى سابنى وحس فجأة إنى بحلو فى عينيه
إيه اللى جابك ما أنت كنت رميت وراك
أنت صح أنا مستاهلش أكون معاك
ومين قالك طلبت رجوع ده بعدك عنى كان راحتى
لو أنتى بجد عايزة رجوع وجودك مش فى مصلحتى
نسيتك قافل الموضوع ياريت تتقبلى صراحتى
لو أنتى لاحظتى حاجة وشوفتى حاجة بجد عينيك مخدوعين
مش ملاحظ حاجة غريبة
مش ملاحظ حاجة غريبة
إن صوتك مش بيعلى ومش طريقتك
هادى جدا مهما أقولك أو ضايقتك
آه صحيح أنت فجأة فضيلي وقتك
لا ملاحظ إن أنا كسبان وحابب نفسى زى زمان
وشايف عمرى بالألوان وهادى بجد مش قلقان

فى يوم ما مشيتى قلبى ارتاح وبالى أهو راَق
Her hair is soft like the night
The eyeliner brings out the life out of her eyes
I like her dimples
that are on her cheeks, they make her pretty
She makes my callous heart
long for her when it sees her
And even stones speak
when she passes and talk to her
I saw how pretty she is when she shows up
There's nothing like her even in foreign lands
And not even in this continent
Oh her beauty is too much..
She's sweeter than sugar
She's the one who should be called
a moon coming from heaven
And more than this should be said
Just simply and easily put
She took my heart to heaven
Her heart is so pure and sweetly kind
The sweetest thing about her
is the innocence in her words
And a beautiful smile that shows in her eyes
Her emotions are powerful
And that makes her a queen in my heart's eyes
Whenever she touches something
She makes it more beautiful
شعرها ناعم كالليل
الكحل اللي مزهزه عينها
عجباني الغمازة
اللي على الخد اللي بتزينها
بتخلي قلبي القاسي
لما يشوفها يحنلها
والحجر ده ينطق
لما تعدي ويكلمها
انا شوفت حلاوة الطلة
مفيش منها في بلاد برة
ولا حتى اتنين في القارة
ماهو دي عليها جمال
اكتر من السكر حلى
ماهو دي اللي عليها اتسمى
قمرة وجاية من الجنة
واكتر من كده يتقال
دي بالراحة وبصراحة
للجنة جابت قلبي

في كلامها براءة

ودي لما بتلمس الحاجة
بإديها بتحليها
Since the day that we left each other, my sadness left me too
I don't need you, I didn't find myself with you
I left all this world and came to you
But now I will prove that i could forget you (x2)
Oh, while I'm with you, I lost many years, days..
And it wont come back again..
Tears are over, and we already lost
There was a past between us, and it is gone
It was love have many hurts
I think from my right to rest someday, the same all the people rest..
I won't believe you again.. my hurt made me strong
I'm not like before anymore..
I became not weak when i talk about you..
Don't say that I lost you
But I'm saying that I'm who winner
Oh, while I'm with you, I lost many years, days..
And it wont come back again..
Tears are over, and we already lost
There was a past between us, and it is gone
It was love have many hurts
I think from my right to rest someday, the same all the people rest..
